Drag & drop or click to add clips: 拖放或按一下以新增短片
Are you sure you want to remove the clip: 您確定要移除此短片？您必須再次手動匯入才能復原此動作。
The highlighter allows you to clip the b: 精彩片段工具讓您可以從您的即時直播剪輯最好的精彩時刻，並將其編輯在一起來組成令人興奮，可以直接上傳到 YouTube 的精彩片段影片。
The replay buffer is correctly configure: 重播片段緩衝已正確設定
Adjust replay duration: 調整重播片段持續時間
Set the duration of captured replays. Yo: 設定擷取之重播片段的持續時間。您始終可以在之後對其進行修剪。
Set a hotkey to capture replays: 設定擷取重播片段的熱鍵
highlighterHotkeyInstructions: 開始直播並按下 %{bindingStr} 以擷取重播片段。在完成直播後請回到這裡查看。
Start streaming and capture a replay. Ch: 開始直播並擷取重播片段。在完成直播後請回到這裡查看。
Or, import a clip from your computer: 或是從您的電腦匯入短片
%{filename} already exists. Would you li: %{filename} 已存在。您要將其覆寫嗎？
The render preview shows a low-quality p: 渲染預覽顯示最終渲染視訊的低品質預覽。 最終匯出的視訊會具有更高的解析度、幀率和品質。
Title: 標題
Only you and people you choose can watch: 只有您和您選擇的人員可以觀看您的影片
Anyone with the video link can watch you: 具有影片連結的任何人可以觀看您的影片
Everyone can watch your video: 任何人都可以觀看您的影片
Please connect your YouTube account to u: 請連線到您的 YouTube 帳戶以將影片上傳到 YouTube。
An error occurred while uploading to You: 上傳到 YouTube 時發生錯誤
Your video was successfully uploaded! Cl: 您的影片已成功上傳！按一下下方連結可存取您的影片。請注意，YouTube 需要花一些時間來處理您的影片。
One or more clips could not be imported: 無法匯入一或多個短片，因為其不是以支援的檔案格式錄製。
An error occurred while writing the vide: 寫入影片檔案時發生錯誤
An error occurred while reading audio fr: 從 %{file} 讀取音訊時發生錯誤
Edit your replays with Highlighter, a fr: 使用精彩片段工具編輯您的重播，這是內建於 Streamlabs 的免費編輯器。
Convert to mobile-friendly short video: 轉換為適合行動裝置使用的短片
Subtitle: 子標題
Record your screen with Streamlabs Deskt: 使用 Streamlabs Desktop 錄製您的螢幕。錄製完成後會顯示在這裡。使用 Streamlabs 工具存取您的檔案或進一步編輯。
Manually capture the best moments from y: Manually capture the best moments from your livestream with a hotkey command, and automatically turn them into a highlight video.
End your stream to change the Hotkey or: End your stream to change the Hotkey or the replay duration.
Are you sure you want to delete this str: Are you sure you want to delete this stream and all its associated clips? This action cannot be undone.
Set a title for your stream: Set a title for your stream
Automatically capture the best moments f: Automatically capture the best moments from your livestream and turn them into a highlight video.
You cannot use special characters in thi: You cannot use special characters in this field
